name: (Short Victory) Nuclear Monopoly
victoryString: You have achieved victory through monopoly of Nuclear Power! Thus gaining the power to destroy your opponents and rule the world.
defeatString: Remember to either surpass your opponent in [Science], or just destory them all together.

name: (Short Victory) Industrial
victoryScreenHeader:
(Short Term Victory) Build 6 [Civilian Factory Complex] and then [Industrial Revolution]
to win!
victoryString: You have achieved victory through industrialising the fastest in the world, defining the industrial age as others cant compete
defeatString: Remember to either surpass your opponent in [Production], or just destory them all together.

name: Scientific
victoryScreenHeader:
Complete all the spaceship parts
to win!
victoryString: You have achieved victory through mastery of Science! You have conquered the mysteries of nature and led your people on a voyage to a brave new world! Your triumph will be remembered as long as the stars burn in the night sky!
defeatString: Remember to either surpass your opponent in science, or just destory them all together.

name: Policy
victoryScreenHeader:
Complete 8 Policy branches and consolidate your ideology 
to win!
victoryString: You have proven your civlization is the most adapt leader of the world. As your ways of govern are the most superior
defeatString: Remember to either surpass your opponent in culture, or just destory them all together.

name: Diplomatic
victoryScreenHeader:
Build the UN and be voted
world leader to win!
victoryString: You have triumphed over your foes through the art of diplomacy! Your cunning and wisdom have earned you great friends - and divided and sown confusion among your enemies! Forever will you be remembered as the leader who brought peace to this weary world!
defeatString: Remember to either surpass your opponent in city-state ownership, or just destory them all together.

name: Domination
victoryString: The world has been convulsed by war. Many great and powerful civilizations have fallen, but you have survived - and emerged victorious! The world will long remember your glorious triumph!
defeatString: Defend or take the initiative, dont put all your resources toward development.

name: Religious
victoryString: We have converted all the people in the world to the same belief, the true way shall guide the humanity forward!
defeatString: Remember, it is important to not let those pesky missionary take your people's heart! Next time.

name: Time
milestones: Have highest score after max turns
victoryString: The world has been convulsed by war. Many great and powerful civilizations have fallen, but you have survived - and emerged victorious! The world will long remember your glorious triumph!
defeatString: The survival of the fittest. And it isn't you.
